org.alicebot.ab

Class Bot

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.alicebot.ab.Bot

  • public class Bot
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the primary Bot class. For each user using the System a new Bot object with a unique id will be created. The current implementation is single user however. This class sets up all of the other class required for the Bot to "think". Most of the constructors supplied are for testing or utility.
    Author:
    Dave

        name -

      • Bot

        public Bot(java.lang.String name,
           java.lang.String path,
           java.lang.String action)
        Primary Constructor. This lets you start a bot with the specified name. The name is used to identify the Bot's base folder in the bots directory set at startup.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the Bot's directory where all of it's AIML and settings files are stores
        path - The root path to look in for the Bot
        action - Program AB action to take, usually chat
